job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
As a front engineer in the team, you will work with customers, product managers, and SRE experts to define observability product features and drive their requirements and implementation.
Basic Qualification
s:
3+ years of relevant work experi
ence
Proficiency in TypeScript, Javascript, CSS, HTML, and Rea
ct.js
Excellent programming skills - developing, debugging, testing and optimizing
code.
Passionate about building elegant and powerful user interfaces to solve customer pr
oblems.

systems.
Comfortable making usable design and layout decisions inde
pendently
Strong communication skills, both verbal an
d written.
Extensive knowledge of web standards and modern browsers and of the full web techno
logy stack.

est, Webpack)

Qualifications:

r technical users

drive, and ownership.
